title: Alpha and PBE sign ups
body:
Hello,

I signed up for the Alpha testing like a few weeks ago when Riot opened it up for testers to join. I was wondering if you guys are still picking people to sign up for it or you stopped searching. Was also wondering the same thing with the PBE testing as well

replies.body: Alpha and PBE sign ups are independent, so it would be necessary to sign up for each one individually.  I don't believe any changes have been made to acceptance, so applying should still be good.  I can't make any guarantees or expedite applications, but wish you the best of luck with admissions!
Okay sounds good. I really hope to have the chance to be one of the testers :) .
